item.title: We Learned This
item.description: Sometimes I think about what my generation is all about and it feels like we should have all been population scientists. Remember ‘Population education’. I can’t believe we hammered our heads about a subject for countless hours when it could have been taught in an NGO seminar. If you are a parent reading this. Don’t send your kid to an expensive school. Make sure he ends up a Vlogger. Good money in the business.
